headline: PharmaLogic Announces Appointment of Etienne Montagut as President and Chief Executive Officer
summary: PharmaLogic Holdings Corp. ("PharmaLogic" or "the Company"), a leading contract development and manufacturing organization (CDMO) specialized in radiopharmaceuticals, today announces the Company has appointed Etienne Montagut, currently serving as President, to the position of President and Chief Executive Officer, effective as of 1 June 2025.

headline: GE HealthCare - Updated NCCN Clinical Practice Guidelines in Oncology Recommend Use of FES PET Imaging for Lobular Breast Cancer
